text: Robert "Bob" Hastings (April 18, 1925 - June 30, 2014) was an American movie, television, voice, stage, and radio actor who is known for his voice work as Commissioner James Gordon in Batman: The Animated Series. Hastings was born on April 18, 1925 in Brooklyn, New York City.Bob Hastings Biography (1925-2014) Hastings had been married to Joan Rice since the 1940s. They had four children. His brother was actor Don Hastings. Hastings died from prostate cancer on June 30, 2014 in Burbank, California, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in the United States
